questions.question: This arc is notable for its depiction of the Straw Hat Pirates' battle against the Donquixote Family. What is...?
This arc takes place on an island inhabited by giants and involves a struggle against a corrupt government official. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' encounter with a group of powerful fish-men and a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This ability, often used by Monkey D. Luffy, drastically increases his speed and power, and changes his skin to a reddish color. What is...?
This technique, used by a certain pirate captain, involves creating a giant spectral elephant. What is...?
questions.answer: Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth

questions.question: This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to turn themselves and anything they touch invisible. What is...?
This character is known for their alias 'O-Nami' and their ability to manipulate weather, often seen with a weapon called the 'Clima-Tact'. Who is...?
This character, known as 'The Surgeon of Death', is the captain of the Heart Pirates and possesses the Ope Ope no Mi. Who is...?
This character, a former Revolutionary Army commander, is known for his ability to create destructive earthquakes with the Gura Gura no Mi. Who is...?
